mapper.select: SELECT M.*, P.ORIGINALNAME FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN PROFILE P ON(M.USERNO=P.USERNO) WHERE M.USERNO=#{userNo}
SELECT COUNT(PROSALE) FROM PRODUCT WHERE USERNO=#{userNo}
SELECT AVG(SCORE) FROM REVIEW WHERE PRONO IN (SELECT PRONO FROM PRODUCT WHERE USERNO=#{userNo})

SELECT C.*, PI.* FROM (SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE USERNO=#{profileDTO.userNo} ORDER BY CREATEDATE DESC)A)B)C LEFT JOIN PRODUCTIMAGE PI ON(C.PRONO=PI.PRONO) WHERE R BETWEEN #{pager.startRow} AND #{pager.lastRow}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, A.* FROM (SELECT RE.*, M.USERID, P.FILENAME, PD.PRONAME FROM REVIEW RE JOIN MEMBER M ON(RE.USERNO=M.USERNO) LEFT JOIN PROFILE P ON(RE.USERNO=P.USERNO) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT PD ON(RE.PRONO=PD.PRONO) WHERE RE.PRONO IN (SELECT PRONO FROM PRODUCT WHERE USERNO=#{profileDTO.userNo}) ORDER BY RE.REVIEWDATE DESC)A)B WHERE R BETWEEN #{pager.startRow} AND #{pager.lastRow}
SELECT COUNT(PRONO) FROM PRODUCT WHERE USERNO=#{profileDTO.userNo}
